LanguageData.MFI_AnnualExpo.label: the annual expo
LanguageData.MFI_BumperCropRequest.label: harvesting request
LanguageData.MFI_Quest_PeaceTalks.label: a war is coming?
LanguageData.MFI_Quest_PeaceTalks.letterText:
You've received a message from [PAWN_nameDef], {0} of {1}. Their faction recently had diplomatic troubles with another faction and call upon you to negotiate between them and {2}. They've picked a neutral nearby location and invite you to come negotiate.
It could be a great opportunity to improve relations with their faction, but beware - a poor negotiator can cause more harm than good and even anger them.
The offer will expire after {3} days, after which [PAWN_nameDef] fears the worst.
